title: Kevin Hart, Oscar Drama, The Upside, Trump and The Wall, Rapid Fire, Eagles, Show Close and more.
itunes:title: Kevin Hart, Oscar Drama, The Upside, Trump and The Wall, Rapid Fire, Eagles, Show Close and more.
description:
Kevin Hart is our special guest host for today. He once and for all puts his foot down in regards to the Oscars. The Upside is Kevin Hart's brand new movie that showcases another dimension other than comedy. Trump wants to declare a state of emergency for the wall. Kevin Hart answers Rapid Fire Questions. He also praises his Eagles and predicts a trip to the Super Bowl. Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
